column5: Busy rods last night, 7/9 - all high teens and low twenties.  We have an amazing Chinook fishery.....right in our own backyard!  :-)
nice fish man! im a little jelous right about now
Good shootin ....bring those skills over to our lake and have a go during the Chantry Chinook Classic  7 for 9 ??? someone messed up twice eh ??? j/k
Good fishing with ya buddy. Lost a nice one near the boat broke a piece of the treble. That's right broke the hook    Best fishing in ontario.
holy cow man... those are huuuge.... no OFC sign though
WOW amazing fish. I'm so jealous . I wish I could go salmon fishing, must be one heck of a fight.
dang them some very nice fish thanks for sharing

Those are some nice fish man, I'm jealous right now. Just wondering how deep you are fishing? A buddy and me are going out for the first time ever  tomorrow so we are just wondering where to start. We are using dipsey's and spin doctors so we just need to know how deep to run them.

Wll Fishnpro, kinda depends what water you are fishing.....  In general, I would start in 60 fow and start working my way out looking for bait balls. Stagger the depths and let the hunting begin.  Tightlines!
what no casting ?  Nice fish for sure  TB
Nope ...no casting required....ya just have to hurry up and wait
Right on ! nice fish as always
mmmm mmmm ... barbequed salmon steaks !!!  Good to see the fishery is still strong and healthy ... georgous fish .. thanks for sharing !
